dict.acceptation: 回答，答复；反应；报复（行动）；[法律]答辩；
[法律]（原告对被告）答辩；反响；作答；（以行动）做出反应；

sent.orig: "Possessor" was a mistake for "professor andware reply" must be "wire reply. "
sent.trans: “教捋”即“教授”的错误，“电霸”准是“电复”。

sent.orig: Thank you very much for your reply and I apologize for my late reply.
sent.trans: 非常感谢你的回复。我很抱歉这么晚才给你答复。

sent.orig: If you have a look at the main header, you see the From, Reply-Toand Sender fields.
sent.trans: 如果你有看的主要标题，您会看到从，回复和发件人领域。

sent.orig: Urge a prompt reply and note that the letter is confirmation of a telexed message.
sent.trans: 敦促早日回复，指出本函是用来确认电传。

sent.orig: His reply sounded to her like a reproach.
sent.trans: 他的回答在她听来像是责备。
